Development guide and deployment guide written. No automated tests or CI/CD pipeline.
Architecture document written: Jamstack simplified pattern with data flow diagrams.
All supporting docs written: project-overview, source-tree-analysis, api-contracts, ui-component-inventory, asset-inventory, development-guide, deployment-guide.

Workflow complete. 11 files generated in docs/.
